title: BRIEF-New Delhi- BP Chair Says Break Even Oil Price For BP Is Below $50/BBL
text:
© Reuters. BRIEF-New Delhi- BP Chair Says Break Even Oil Price For BP Is Below $50/BBL

Oct 14 (Reuters) -

* NEW DELHI- BP (LON: ) CEO SAYS BP-RELIANCE INDUSTRIES TO BRING ABOUT 1 BCF/ DAY NEW GAS ONSTREAM IN 3 YRS

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS INVENTORY IS HIGHER THAN NORMAL CURRENTLY

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS INDIAN NATURAL GAS PRICING WILL HELP UNLOCK MORE INVESTMENT

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS LOW PRICED LNG CARGOES COMING TO INDIA ARE MAINLY DISTRESS CARGOES

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS DOMESTIC GAS PRICE WILL BE COMPETITIVE TO IMPORTED LNG IN INDIA

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS NEED TO SEE DETAILS OF INDIA'S PLAN TO SELL GOVERNMENT STAKE IN A BIG REFINER

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS SEE GLOBAL OIL PRICES IN $60-65/BBL TERRITORY

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS GLOBAL INVENTORY LEVELS ARE HIGHER BUT EXPECT OPEC + PARTNERSHIP TO KEEP THAT IN CHECK

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS OIL PRICES ABOVE $50/BBL HELPS BP

* NEW DELHI- BP CHAIR SAYS BREAK EVEN OIL PRICE FOR BP IS BELOW $50/ BBL Further company coverage: BP.L
description: BRIEF-New Delhi- BP Chair Says Break Even Oil Price For BP Is Below $50/BBL
